name: pihome
0:
”Alexa, start pi home”
”turn on bedroom light”
”turn off kitchen light”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pi home
des:
You can control your home electrical appliances by voice command.
You can turn ON and OFF lamp OR you can control the speed of the fan 

Sample example 
Alexa turn on bedroom light


You will be required a Raspberry Pi working as MQTT client.

Details 
https://www.hackster.io/25439/voice-controlled-smart-home-36e37e
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
